## Monoids

As an algebraic structure:
$$
\begin{align*}
  e					&: A \\
  \blank\mult\blank &: A^2 \to A \\
  \forall x			&,\: e \mult x = x \\
  \forall x			&,\: x \mult e = x \\
  \forall x, y, z	&,\: (x \mult y) \mult z = x \mult (y \mult z)
\end{align*}
$$

As a Lawvere theory:

::: imagify

```{=latex}
% https://q.uiver.app/#q=WzAsMyxbMCwwLCJBXjAiXSxbMiwwLCJBIl0sWzQsMCwiQV4yIl0sWzAsMV0sWzIsMV1d
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A^0} && A && {A^2}
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[from=1-5, to=1-3]
\end{tikzcd}
```

:::

As a deductive system:
$$
\begin{prooftree}
	\AxiomC{}
	\UnaryInfC{$\vdash e$}
\end{prooftree}
\qquad\qquad
\begin{prooftree}
	\AxiomC{$\vdash t_1$}
	\AxiomC{$\vdash t_2$}
	\BinaryInfC{$\vdash t_1 \mult t_2$}
\end{prooftree}
$$
